manipulators.description: Fix needed as Obsidian interprets alt-space as non-breaking space, which cannot be mapped. Therefore replaced with Shift-F12, which can be remapped in Obsidian's vimrc.

conditions.description: Prevent footpedal from accidentally triggering twice.

rules.description: ‚ìÇÔ∏èüìß Mimestream: R-Click opens link in background
‚ìÇÔ∏èüìñ Inoreader: v opens in background, switch jk & np
‚ìÇÔ∏èüü¶ Drafts: R-Click opens link in background
üêÅ 5 (hold): search selected text / open URL, (tap): send F16

to_if_held_down.shell_command: SEL=$(pbpaste) ; SEL="${SEL/#\~/$HOME}" ; if [[ -f "$SEL" ]]; then open -R "$SEL" ; elif [[ -d "$SEL" ]]; then open "$SEL" ; elif [[ "$SEL" =~ ^[[:space:]]*http.*[[:space:]]*$ ]]; then open "$(echo "$SEL" | tr -d " ")" ; elif [[ -n "$SEL" ]]; then open "https://www.google.com/search?q=$SEL" ; fi

manipulators.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,
